message.description: Localized text of recommendation, good for UI.

notificationexpirationtime.description: Date and time when this notification expires.

notifiedtime.description: Last timestamp this instance was actually notified. Null means that this recommendation hasn't been notified yet.

recommendationid.description: A GUID value that each recommendation object is associated with.

featured.description: If set, this API returns only the most critical recommendation among the others. Otherwise this API returns all recommendations available

enabled.description: On/off flag indicating the rule is currently enabled or disabled.

channels.description: List of channels that this recommendation can apply.

starttime.description: The beginning time of a range that the recommendation refers to.

resourcescope.description: Name of a resource type this recommendation applies, e.g. Subscription, ServerFarm, Site.

tags.description: The list of category tags that this recommendation belongs to.

actionname.description: Name of action recommended by this object.

displayname.description: UI friendly name of the rule (may not be unique)

creationtime.description: Timestamp when this instance was created.

nextnotificationtime.description: When to notify this recommendation next. Null means that this will never be notified anymore.

resourceid.description: Full ARM resource ID string that this recommendation object is associated with.

level.description: Level indicating how critical this recommendation can impact.

score.description: A metric value measured by the rule.

filter.description: Return only channels specified in the filter. Filter is specified by using OData syntax. Example: $filter=channels eq 'Api' or channel eq 'Notification'

endtime.description: The end time of a range that the recommendation refers to.
